title: Cavanaugh Watch
description: THE LAST CAVANAUGH TO FALLâ€¦Assistant district attorney Janelle Cavanaugh understood how dangerous working on a high-profile criminal case could be. But when her assignment took a deadly turn, she was given a ruggedly handsome and infuriatingly quiet bodyguard.Detective Sawyer Boone absolutely didn't want to babysit the maddening yet attractive daughter of the chief of detectives. Then Janelle's world came crashing down around her, and Sawyer found himself wanting to protect her. Risking his life was part of the job. Risking his heart became quite another matter.
author: Marie Ferrarella
